projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A modern e-commerce platform built with Next.js and Stripe integration. Features real-time inventory management and seamless checkout experience.

projects.title: Portfolio Dashboard
projects.description: Interactive analytics dashboard for tracking portfolio performance. Built with React and D3.js for beautiful data visualizations.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: Collaborative task management application with real-time updates and team workspace features.

projects.title: Weather Forecast Widget
projects.description: Beautiful weather widget with 7-day forecasts and interactive maps. Uses OpenWeather API for real-time data.

projects.title: AI Content Generator
projects.description: AI-powered content generation tool using OpenAI GPT. Create blog posts, social media content, and marketing copy instantly.
